additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: CONTAINS NOT MORE THAN 63G/L HYDROGEN PEROXIDE, 70G/L ETHANOLAMINE, 22G/L SODIUM LAURETH-6 CARBOXYLATE 1x Tube Colour Cream 60ml 1x Bottle Developer 60ml (1:1) 1x Sached Nourishing Conditioner 22.5ml 1x Pair of Gloves 1x Instruction leaflet

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: WARNING-Irritant. Contains hydrogen peroxide, phenylenediamines and resorcinol. See bottom of pack for full list of ingredients. Avoid contact with eyes. Rinse eyes immediately if product comes into contact with them. This product contains ingredients which may cause skin irritation to certain individuals. A preliminary test according to accompanying directions should be made before use. Do not use to dye eyelashes or eyebrows. To do so may be injurious to the eye. Repeated exposure may cause sensitisation. Rinse hair well after application. Wear suitable gloves.
